name: Henix Operating system
short_description:
This Project is under planning phase..

Henix is an new unix system from scratch with support for parallism and with buildin support for virtualization of desktop enviroments and applications. Henix is meant to be a fast and safe alternetive for virtualization of software and systems and to be a good alternitive to time critical systems and instead of dual booting computers with 2 or more operating systems, you can just install your desktop enviroments you want instead so you can save space and time on your computer.
summary: an realtime virtual unix operating system
